an5.265-271:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo dutiyam jhanam … tatiyam jhanam … catuttham jhanam … sotapattiphalam … sakadagamiphalam … anagamiphalam … arahattam sacchikatum.
an5.265-271:1.3: Avasamacchariyam, kulamacchariyam, labhamacchariyam, vannamacchariyam, akatannutam akataveditam.
an5.265-271:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamme appahaya abhabbo arahattam sacchikatum.
an5.265-271:2.1: Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo dutiyam jhanam … tatiyam jhanam … catuttham jhanam … sotapattiphalam … sakadagamiphalam … anagamiphalam … arahattam sacchikatum.
an5.265-271:2.3: Avasamacchariyam, kulamacchariyam, labhamacchariyam, vannamacchariyam, akatannutam akataveditam.
an5.265-271:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamme pahaya bhabbo arahattam sacchikatun”ti.
